Check out the resources available at this site.  I recently participated in a webinar on the topic of auditor roles in improving government performance.  One section covered the process of auditing the performance management process and data.  It was excellent.  The City of Austin has significant experience in this activity.  http://auditorroles.org/

author: Nafia Khan
text:
The City of Fort Lauderdale is seeking to ensure performance measures are valid and reliable. Do any cities have any experience with this? We also wondered if any cities conduct any training in this area. 
Thanks!
Nafia Khan
title: Ensuring performance measures are valid
